response.overview: College student, Trish and her best friend Dawn have just been given the best opportunity of their young lives. Invited to participate in a private GEO-CACHE race the girls have the chance to win ten thousand dollars. Unfortunately, Trish soon realizes that while she is hunting for the prize cache, something else is hunting her. Tortured by the tragedies of her families' past, and facing the evils they have long hidden, Trish must learn to rely on herself if she is to survive.
response.title: Hidden
